semantic_title: Includes Notes: Definition and Examples for Category Content
section_path: Section I > A. Conventions > 10. Includes Notes

content.full_text: This note appears immediately under a three-character code title to further define, or give examples of, the content of the category. (Evidence: pg no: 9, L73-L75)
content.summary: Defines Includes Notes as appearing under three-character code titles to provide definitions or examples of category content (Evidence: pg no: 9, L73-L75)
key_concepts: Includes Notes appear under three-character code titles (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74)
Notes further define category content (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74-L75)
Notes give examples of category content (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74-L75)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Includes Notes appear immediately under a three-character code title (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74)
detailed_rules.explanation: These instructional notes are positioned directly below category titles to provide immediate clarification (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Includes Notes further define or give examples of the category content (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74-L75)
detailed_rules.explanation: These notes provide additional definition or specific examples to clarify what conditions belong in the category (Evidence: pg no: 9, L74-L75)

workflow_steps: Step 2: Check for Includes Notes immediately below title
Step 3: Review definitions and examples provided
Step 4: Verify condition fits within category scope

best_practices: Always check for Includes Notes under category titles
Use notes to verify appropriate category selection
common_mistakes: Ignoring Includes Notes when selecting codes
tips: Includes Notes provide valuable category clarification
implementation_notes: Notes help ensure accurate category assignment
clinical_context: Provides clinical context for category boundaries
